page.title: 04Brockenhurst Football Club
page.content: The club was formed in 1898 when they played in the New Forest League, at that time they changed in the Rose & Crown Public House and used one of the pitches at the tertiary college. In 1935 they were elected in the Hampshire County League,which they play in now. Just before the 2nd World War the club nearly folded but it was rejuvenated in 1945 and played for a short time in the Bournemouth league before returning to the Hampshire League in 1948. Their present Grigg Lane pitch was purchased for Â£750 in 1950. The club have had success in recent years,being promoted to Hampshire League Division One in 1973 and reaching the last 16 of the F.A.Vase in 1976.
